about_the_game:
Tenacious and musically gifted, Mari is everything a siren queen’s daughter ought to be. Except for the fact that her punk rock bloodsong power can make a simple melody more like a deadly explosive. With this weapon and sheer rebellious spirit, Mari seeks to escape her palace confines in order to headline her band's concert. Traversing through the cavernous dungeons might have been easy, if it weren’t for rogue enemies of a sleazy undersea shanty town thwarting her every move. Mari must rock on with her bloodsong, blast a few eardrums along the way, and get to her concert–before her queen mother’s army gets to her first.

A twist on an action rhythm game, BLOODSONG entices players to use their musical pitch-matching ear as a form of combat. Listen to enemies’ bloodsongs–that is, their main musical melody–in order to learn how to defeat them. As you explore the atmospheric undersea world of the sirens, face off against biting anglerfish and cheeky crabs, all in order to get Mari to the stage. And prove, once and for all, that nothing is a match for teenage angst.

short_description: She's just a teenage siren. Let her rock... Play as Mari, a punk rock siren princess, who’s hell-bent on headlining her concert no matter the cost. Use your ear and “bloodsong” to match musical pitch, defeat enemies, and solve puzzles along the way. The stage is set–are you ready to rock?!
